name: Painted Legend 2
description:
Welcome to a world where fantasies come to life!
Painted Legend 2 is an adventure 2.5D platformer game made in the style of 80s cartoons, where you have to play for one of heroes with different characteristics and abilities.

The hero has to overcome a lot of obstacles and destroy dozens of evil enemies!
Unlock new heroes, collect coins and be sure to try our signature potion of immortality!
